label.phrase: the knuckleball really kept me in the game tonight

clusterList.phrase: the knuckleball really kept me in the game tonight
i just kept on pitching and it started getting gradually worse instead of just hurting on my split-finger i started to feel it on my cutters and fastball
i hit a few home runs and was puffing my chest out my dad said you know those balls are probably fly-ball outs at your high school field he was trying to level me off
i really didn't know how bad it was after the initial hit i knew there was something wrong but i didn't know how bad it was until later

i thought it was a googly and then it could have been on the off stump also because sometimes it becomes difficult for the umpires to pick but then it struck on the middle stump we just took a chance to avail of the review system
i've been staying on it and trying to hit it wherever it's pitched
everyone's been saying you still had the presence of mind to jump on the football when you dropped it but i do remember as soon as i got hit i knew something was wrong
i felt a bit nervous being away from the mound and the team for such a long time
i made a good swing and the nerves went away absolutely five feet off the tee box
